metadata.title: CVE-2018-14363 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in NeoMutt before 2018-07-16. newsrc.c does notproperly restrict '/' characters that may have unsafe interaction withcache pathnames.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14363` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

neomutt - 20171215+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: neomutt package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '20171215+dfsg.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
